channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gen Z’s most notable status symbols, and the motivations behind them
item.description: Erewhon smoothies, thrifted Coach bags and platinum American Express cards are Gen Z's status symbols—and they signify a lot more than bank balance.

item.title: Sha’Carri Richardson sprints onto U.S. Olympic team after winning 100 in 10.71 seconds
item.description: Sha'Carri Richardson earned her spot in the Paris Olympics, winning the 100-meter final in a season-best 10.71 seconds on Saturday at U.S. track trials.

item.title: Here's how millionaires shifted their asset allocation last year
This is the ‘special sauce’ behind American exceptionalism—and why the U.S. stock market could continue dominating
item.description: “Many countries have these various advantages, but none have the combination—or the entire package—quite like the U.S. does,” RiverFront Investment Group’s chief strategist said.

item.title: Houthi claims of attack on U.S. aircraft carrier are false, U.S. officials say
item.description: A claim by Yemen's Houthi group that its forces had attacked the U.S. aircraft carrier Dwight D. Eisenhower in the Red Sea is false, two U.S. officials said.

item.title: ‘It’s pure greed’: Parking prices for concerts can now eclipse $1,000
Pets make for the best financial advisers and motivators. They force you to be more mindful about your spending, study shows
item.description: Pets inspire good money habits such as long-term investments and emergency savings.

item.title: EU and China set for talks on planned electric vehicle tariffs
item.description: Germany's Economy Minister Robert Habeck said he had been informed by the EU commissioner that there would be concrete negotiations on tariffs with China.

item.title: Junk bonds are beating the broader market so far in 2024 — but watch this shift
Deel CEO was told he’d need to replace his entire leadership team for the business to reach unicorn status—now it’s valued at $12 billion and he’s ‘kept 80% of the same team as when it was at $0’
item.description: Entrepreneurs perhaps expect to lose sleep when scaling their venture from the ground up into a unicorn—but Deel's founder Alex Bouaziz was warned he’d have to also lose his entire leadership team in the process.

item.title: 4 ways to earn extra cash this summer, from people whose side hustles bring in $100,000/year or more
item.description: From renting out you car to turning your career into content, here’s four summer side hustles that have proven lucrative.

item.title: MicroStrategy’s bitcoin approach has pushed its stock up over 1,000% since 2020
The wealthy are dropping up to $10,000 a month on social wellness clubs to relax and reverse age with their peers
item.description: Members-only social wellness clubs offer curated experiences and luxury amenities.

item.title: This planet-friendly diet may help you live a longer, healthier life, study shows
item.description: Risk of premature death was 30% lower for people who ate a planet-friendly diet, according to a recent study. Here's what the diet entails.

item.title: As Nvidia drives a 2024 chip rally, why are some AI stocks getting left behind
